list.description:
Frieren from the anime "Sousou no Frieren".

There are 3 variants of the sight.

The file for editing is present.

#all_tanks #anime #frieren #sousou_no_frieren #elf #bikini #sight

#anime #spiceandwolf #holo #holowolf #wtdraw
It's time for my most favorite persanage, the great wolf Holo, I hope you'll appreciate it)

Hi fellas!
I'm back with another usersight I've personally made myself. It's a diamond-shaped reticle inspired by the works of the likes of my good friend @__Ren_ who used to make these incredibly good looking usersights for top tier tanks I still use today.

This is my first attempt in making a proper usersight myself. There are some imperfections in some lines that don't connect properly, but overall I think this turned out pretty good.

As an added bonus, there's an alternate version of this sight with the Metallica logo attached on the sight of the tank. Seek and Destroy your enemi...

I dont know who it is, but I like it I would like to find r34 art would be with it and would make myself such a sight for personal use, in the file 5 variants of the size of the sight, the sight is comfortable, I hope you like it.

Hello again everyone. Another interesting sight. I made it a couple of days ago, but there were many mistakes because of which I refused to publish it, then I reworked it for a long time and highlighted only the main thing.

I will say right away that there may be inaccuracies somewhere, since this is a picture made in blender or any other application and there are almost no contours, I think this is noticeable in the picture, I tried my best. Somewhere I used my skills, and som...

Прицел удобный, надеюсь вам понравиться!

The sight is convenient, I hope you like it!
